subject: Languages
title: Egyptian Hieroglyphs Meet Emojis
description: Learn Egyptian Hieroglyphs Meet Emojis in one minute.

hook.text: People joke that emojis are modern hieroglyphs. The comparison is more accurate than most people realize.

buildup.text: Both use small pictures to convey meaning. Both mix with text. Both are often misunderstood by outsiders.

discovery.text: Hieroglyphs used 'determinatives' ‚Äî silent pictures added to clarify meaning. Emojis do something similar.

twist.text: But hieroglyphs are a full writing system with grammar. Emojis supplement writing ‚Äî they can't replace it.

climax.text: The human instinct to communicate with small pictures is at least 5,000 years old ‚Äî and still going.

punchline.text: Hieroglyphs wrote a civilization's literature. Emojis write 'sounds good üëç.'

quiz.question: How are emojis similar to hieroglyphic determinatives?
options: Both add pictures to clarify the meaning of text
